posts.subject: Death Stranding
posts.body:
==So tell me /v/, how does her umbrella even work?== Doesn't the time rain just flow through the openings?

Forbes review: http://archive.is/XRrTh
>It often feels like a chore, like the game is doing its level best to keep you from having a good time.
Literally two lines down:
>this is not a complete review, but rather a review-in-progress
Why the fuck do journos gotta be like that? Why even write a fucking article at that point?

>>75ec77d1-6d7f-46a4-8ca1-46a726d97fe4
So you believe to be better of not masturbating?
Maybe some of us just can enjoy something, without it taking over our life.
>I drink a beer in the evening.
Maybe "it affects the chemicals in my brain", but I enjoy it and it doesn't define me.
>I smoke a cigar once a couple months.
Maybe "it affects the chemicals in my brain", but I enjoy it and it doesn't define me.
>I jack it for the victory champagne couple times a week into a pre-warmed fleshlight (outside November).
Maybe "it affects the chemicals in my brain", but I enjoy it and it doesn't define me.
Yet you are so scared of naked women on the screen and live in looney land, where the mere thought of a perfect 10 during the day transforms you into a wank-craving zombie.
Maybe you just are that paranoid and weak?
